ECT_small_model.m

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 clear all;
00002 close all;
00003 global data_type; 
00004 data_type = 'double';
00005 
00006 tic
00007 
00008 % Sensor elements
00009 % remember! thick is rmax-rmin,
00010 
00011 fov_radius      = 40;    %[mm] diameter = 2*fov_radius
00012 ins1_thick      = 0;     %[mm]
00013 electrode_thick = 1;     %[mm]
00014 ins3_thick      = 2;     %[mm]
00015 screen_thick    = 1;     %[mm]
00016 matrix_size     = 90;    %[mm]
00017 grid_size       = 1;     %[mm]
00018 
00019 rekonstruction_mtx_pix_size_small=32;
00020 
00021 ins1_min_r=fov_radius;
00022 
00023 %check is matrix size big enough
00024 all_elem_size=2*(fov_radius+ins1_thick+electrode_thick+ins3_thick+screen_thick);
00025 if(all_elem_size>matrix_size)
00026     error('Sensor elements size are bigger than discretization grid');
00027 end
00028 
00029 % sensor
00030 number_of_electrodes=16;
00031 ratio_electrode_to_insulator=2.4;
00032 start_ins2_angle=6.5;
00033 
00034 % phantoms
00035 d_mm =10;
00036 D_mm =11.05;
00037 
00038 indx = [10 1 18 21 23 31];
00039     
00040 rotate_pha=17;
00041 pha_perm=3;
00042 
00043 pha_min_perm=1;
00044 pha_avg_perm=2;
00045 pha_max_perm=3;
00046 
00047 % algorithm LBP_LM
00048 alg_params_LBP_LM.method='LBP_LM';
00049 alg_params_LBP_LM.numiter=115;
00050 alg_params_LBP_LM.stop_delta=1e-10;
00051 alg_params_LBP_LM.update_method='modulo';
00052 alg_params_LBP_LM.iter_mod=55;
00053 alg_params_LBP_LM.update_delta=0.1;
00054 alg_params_LBP_LM.alpha=0.1;
00055 alg_params_LBP_LM.alpha_=0.1; 
00056 alg_params_LBP_LM.alphalimit='noadapt';
00057 alg_params_LBP_LM.regular='L-curve';
00058 alg_params_LBP_LM.u=0.1;
00059 
00060 % algorithm LM
00061 alg_params_LM.method='LM';
00062 alg_params_LM.numiter=115;
00063 alg_params_LM.stop_delta=1e-10;
00064 alg_params_LM.update_method='modulo';
00065 alg_params_LM.iter_mod=55;
00066 alg_params_LM.update_delta=0.1;
00067 alg_params_LM.alpha=0.1;
00068 alg_params_LM.alpha_=0.1; 
00069 alg_params_LM.alphalimit='noadapt';
00070 alg_params_LM.regular='L-curve';
00071 alg_params_LM.u=0.1;
00072 
00073 % algorithm LBP
00074 alg_params_LBP.method='LBP';
00075 alg_params_LBP.numiter=1;
00076 alg_params_LBP.stop_delta=0;
00077 alg_params_LBP.update_method='modulo';
00078 alg_params_LBP.iter_mod=0;
00079 alg_params_LBP.update_delta=0;
00080 alg_params_LBP.alpha=0;
00081 alg_params_LBP.alpha_=0; %alpha_=alpha;
00082 alg_params_LBP.alphalimit='noadapt';
00083 alg_params_LBP.regular='manual';
00084 alg_params_LBP.u=0;
00085 
00086 
00087 % Discretization Grid
00088 
00089 dg=Discretization_grid_2D_square(matrix_size,grid_size);
00090 
00091 
00092 % Field of view
00093 fov=Sensor_element_circular(0,360,0,fov_radius,dg,'none',1,'fov');
00094 
00095 % Electrode & Insulator between electrodes
00096 electrode_min_r=ins1_min_r+ins1_thick;
00097 
00098 number_of_insulator_beetween_electrodes=number_of_electrodes;
00099 % Memory allocation
00100 Electrodes_vector=repmat(Sensor_element_circular,1,number_of_electrodes);
00101 Insulator2_vector=repmat(Sensor_element_circular,1,number_of_insulator_beetween_electrodes);
00102 
00103 
00104 electrode_angle=360/(number_of_electrodes*(1+(1/ratio_electrode_to_insulator)));
00105 insulator2_angle=360/(number_of_electrodes*(1+ratio_electrode_to_insulator));
00106 
00107 for p=1:1:number_of_electrodes;
00108     Insulator2_vector(p)=...
00109         Sensor_element_circular(...
00110         start_ins2_angle+(p-1)*insulator2_angle+(p-1)*electrode_angle, ...
00111         start_ins2_angle+(p)*insulator2_angle+(p-1)*electrode_angle, ...
00112         electrode_min_r,electrode_min_r+electrode_thick,dg,'none',2,'ins2');
00113 
00114     Electrodes_vector(p)=...
00115         Sensor_element_circular(...
00116         start_ins2_angle+(p)*insulator2_angle+(p-1)*electrode_angle,...
00117         start_ins2_angle+(p)*insulator2_angle+(p)*electrode_angle,...
00118         electrode_min_r,electrode_min_r+electrode_thick,dg,12,10000,'electrode');
00119 end
00120 
00121 % Insulator 3
00122 ins3_min_r=electrode_min_r+electrode_thick;
00123 ins3=Sensor_element_circular(0,360,ins3_min_r,ins3_min_r+ins3_thick,dg,'none',2,'ins3');
00124 
00125 % Screen
00126 scrn_min_r=ins3_min_r+ins3_thick;
00127 scrn=Sensor_element_circular(0,360,scrn_min_r,scrn_min_r+screen_thick,dg,0,10000,'screen');
00128 
00129 % Sensor
00130 % Last element is on top
00131 
00132 s=Sensor_2D(dg);
00133 s.add_element(fov);
00134 
00135 
00136 number_of_insulator_beetween_electrodes=length(Insulator2_vector);
00137 for i=1:number_of_insulator_beetween_electrodes
00138     s.add_element(Insulator2_vector(i));
00139 end
00140 
00141 s.add_element(ins3);
00142 s.add_element(scrn);
00143 
00144 number_of_electrodes=numel(Electrodes_vector);
00145 for i=1:number_of_electrodes
00146         s.add_element(Electrodes_vector(i));
00147 end
00148 
00149 
00150 %phantom_gen=Phantom_generator_2D(fov,'ask_me',rotate_pha,pha_perm,d_mm,D_mm);       
00151 phantom_gen=Phantom_generator_2D(fov,'rods_indx',rotate_pha,pha_perm,d_mm,D_mm,indx);
00152 
00153 pd=Permittivity_distribution_2D(fov);
00154 
00155 pd.add_Element(phantom_gen);
00156 
00157 % phantom_gen2=Phantom_generator_2D(fov,'ask_me',0,pha_perm,d_mm,D_mm);       
00158 % pd.add_Element(phantom_gen2);
00159 
00160  
00161 Ef_pha_small=Electrical_field_2D(s,pd,rekonstruction_mtx_pix_size_small);
00162 
00163 % small reconstruction grid
00164 
00165 % max
00166 phantom_max=Phantom_generator_2D(fov,'uniform',pha_max_perm);     
00167 pd_max=Permittivity_distribution_2D(fov);
00168 pd_max.add_Element(phantom_max);
00169 Ef_max_small=Electrical_field_2D(s,pd_max,rekonstruction_mtx_pix_size_small);
00170 
00171 % min
00172 phantom_min=Phantom_generator_2D(fov,'uniform',pha_min_perm);     
00173 pd_min=Permittivity_distribution_2D(fov);
00174 pd_min.add_Element(phantom_min);
00175 Ef_min_small=Electrical_field_2D(s,pd_min,rekonstruction_mtx_pix_size_small);
00176 
00177 % avg
00178 phantom_avg=Phantom_generator_2D(fov,'uniform',pha_avg_perm);     
00179 pd_avg=Permittivity_distribution_2D(fov);
00180 pd_avg.add_Element(phantom_avg);
00181 Ef_avg_small=Electrical_field_2D(s,pd_avg,rekonstruction_mtx_pix_size_small);
00182 
00183 rek_object_LM_small=Reconstructor_2D(Ef_pha_small,Ef_max_small,Ef_min_small,Ef_avg_small);
00184 rek_object_LBP_LM_small=Reconstructor_2D(Ef_pha_small,Ef_max_small,Ef_min_small,Ef_avg_small);
00185 rek_object_LBP_small=Reconstructor_2D(Ef_pha_small,Ef_max_small,Ef_min_small,Ef_avg_small);
00186 
00187 
00188 rek_object_LM_small.it_recon(alg_params_LM,'no_display');
00189 rek_object_LBP_LM_small.it_recon(alg_params_LBP_LM,'no_display');
00190 rek_object_LBP_small.it_recon(alg_params_LBP,'no_display');
00191

00193 toc
